settings.promo_text: Description of promotion with lots of details.

settings.text: Unprecedented Convenience: Serving a holiday meal can be time-consuming and stressful — especially when you’re busy with other holiday tasks like shopping for gifts and readying your home for overnight gifts. In handling all of the meal prep, Table & Twine takes the trouble out of the equation.

Quicker Cooking and Cleanup, Too: Around the holidays, we all feel like there aren’t enough hours in the day. In handling all the shopping, chopping, slicing, and dicing, Table & Twine gives you one of life’s most precious commodities: time! In addition to saving time on the front end, you’ll also enjoy quicker and easier cleanups thanks to fewer steps and mindful packaging.

A Chef-Quality Meal — Served By You: Think of Table & Twine as your new secret weapon when it comes to serving your guests a gourmet Christmas meal with all the fixings. At Table & Twine, we believe that food is love. Everything we do comes straight from our hearts to your doorstep.

settings.heading: {{ collection.metafields.custom.second_heading.value }}
settings.heading2: Why Choose a Christmas Meal Kit?
settings.text2: For seasoned and novice cooks alike, we could all benefit from less time in the kitchen and more time with family. When you partner with Table & Twine for your holiday meal, here are just a few of the benefits you’ll enjoy:

settings.title: How much time will I need to prepare the food within my Christmas food kit?
settings.text: Planning and preparing a Christmas meal can take hours. Not to mention the cleanup when it’s over! We work hard to save you as much time and effort as possible. As a rule of thumb, we recommend setting aside at least one hour to transform our prep work into a complete Christmas meal in just a few simple steps.

settings.title: How far in advance do I need to order my Christmas meal kit?
settings.text: To ensure that we can accommodate you, please order your Christmas dinner from Table & Twine by Friday, December 17th. Feel like crossing an item off your to-do list early? Place your order at any time!

settings.title: What if my guests have food allergies?
settings.text: While our chefs have curated a magnificent holiday meal for your Christmas dinner, we also want every one of your guests to feel welcome and satisfied by the experience. If a member of your party has a food allergy or other dietary restriction, simply choose an alternate item from our menu.

settings.heading: Heating Instructions
settings.text: Preparing an allergy-friendly meal by Table & Twine is simple! Just scan the QR code on your meal’s packaging for easy-to-follow heating instructions. These instructions are also available online.
